text:

title: Security concern
text: I got logged out of my acc by an unknown (to me) device. When I managed to log in with my phone and PC, I couldn‚Äôt terminate the session from the unknown device because apparently I can‚Äôt terminate a session from an old device when I‚Äôve just logged in. I‚Äôve enabled two factor authentication but that too seems to be security measure on paper as it hasn‚Äôt helped my matters. One thing I know for sure is that WhatsApp with all its issues makes it so easy to kick out any device from your account that you don‚Äôt recognise. This is so disappointing
